name: Armory master
descriptions: The armory master is a member of the Enclave stationed in the mobile base crawler at Adams Air Force Base in 2277.

The armory master is one of the most adept and skilled soldiers in the Enclaveâ€™s ranks. He created his own custom helmet and Gatling laser to aid him in combat. He is currently tending to the armory in the mobile base crawler, where the Lone Wanderer may encounter him during the battle of Adams Air Force Base.
The armory master spends his day in the armory of the mobile base crawler.
The armory master appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on Broken Steel.
